data.name: Dominion - Alchemy
data.detailed_description:
Alchemy is the 3rd expansion Dominion. It adds 12 new Kingdom cards plus a new resource, Potions.


There are strange things going on in your basement laboratories. They keep calling up for more barrels of quicksilver, or bits of your hair. Well it’s all in the name of progress. They’re looking for a way to turn lead into gold, or at least into something better than lead. That lead had just been too good of a bargain to pass up; you didn’t think, where will I put all this lead, what am I going to do with this lead anyway. Well that will all be sorted out. They’re also looking for a universal solvent. If they manage that one, you will take whatever they use to hold it in and build a castle out of it. A castle that can’t be dissolved! Now that’s progress.

Themed Content


Engines
  • Vineyard - A victory card that rewards action heavy engine decks
  • Apothecary - Sweeps cruft from top of deck into your hand for powerful subsequent turns
  • Scrying Pool - A powerful engine card, can be used to draw clear through your deck
  • University - A decent gainer that skews decks toward action cards
  • Alchemist - Similar to Laboratory, with potential to repeatedly topdeck itself
  • Familiar - A cursor that cantrips
  • Golem - A card that finds two more actions and plays them
  • Apprentice - A non-terminal thrasher with card draw


Potion
The potion treasure has these effects on games.
  • Can result in longer engine games
  • Potion strategies are vulnerable to trashing attacks and Embargo
  • Special interactions with cost-caring cards

Mechanics

Because this set heavily favors actions, most cards here favor engine building. Having the right cards in hand to afford a potion cost card can be challenging, and players will need to strike a balance with how many potions to gain. Because many potion cost cards are otherwise inexpensive, players may want to focus on cards that grant multiple buys.

data.short_description: Alchemy is the 3rd expansion Dominion. It adds 12 new Kingdom cards plus a new resource, Potions.
data.reviews:
“Potions are often very powerful. Plenty to explore.”
I Slay the Dragon

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 or higher
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 2.00 GHz or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 256 MB RAM
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
